channel.title: I Have Seen A Lot Of People Not Liking Some Offensive Classes So I'm Going To Rework Them
channel.description:
Credit to NuclearBurrito, Erik, Firekitten, Solic, and Shrimpy for suggesting some ideas that are in here
[details="Butler"] > [color=lighblue]The Butler, BD, Offensive :dagger:[/color] > = > > Passive 1: Dutiful: Immune to occupation and target change > > Day Ability 1: Forgetful Wine: Remove all of a target's passives for the rest of the game, this will not inform them, 1 use > > Day Ability 2: Nightshade Wine: poison the king with nightshade, he won't be notified, if you poison BD king, you will die of guilt, 1 use > > Night Ability 1: Serve Wine: occupy a player at night > > Night Ability 2: Party: Occupy all players who visit you, goes through occupation immunity, 2 use
[/details]
[details="Servant"] > [color=lapurple]The Servant, Unseen, Offensive :dagger: [/color] > = > Passive 1: Dutiful: Immune to occupation and target change > > Day Ability 2: Forgetful Wine: remove all of a player's passives for the rest of the game, this will not inform them, 1 use > > Day Ability 1: Bewilder: stop a player from using their day abilities, the player will not be informed unless trying to use their abilities, 3 use > > Night Ability 1: Serve Wine: serve a player wine, occupying them for the night > > Night Ability 2: Party: occupy all visitors visiting you, goes through occupation immunity [/details]
Btw this is still work in progress but I'd like to hear some feedback/suggestions :)

item.source: I Have Seen A Lot Of People Not Liking Some Offensive Classes So I'm Going To Rework Them

item.title: I Have Seen A Lot Of People Not Liking Some Offensive Classes So I'm Going To Rework Them
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Credit to NuclearBurrito, Erik, Firekitten, Solic, and Shrimpy for suggesting some ideas that are in here

Butler

The Butler, BD, Offensive

Passive 1: Dutiful: Immune to occupation and target change

Day Ability 1: Forgetful Wine: Remove all of a target’s passives for the rest of the game, this will not inform them, 1 use

Day Ability 2: Nightshade Wine: poison the king with nightshade, he won’t be notified, if you poison BD king, you will die of guilt, 1 use

Night Ability 1: Serve Wine: occupy a player at night

Night Ability 2: Party: Occupy all players who visit you, goes through occupation immunity, 2 use

Servant

The Servant, Unseen, Offensive

Passive 1: Dutiful: Immune to occupation and target change

Day Ability 2: Forgetful Wine: remove all of a player’s passives for the rest of the game, this will not inform them, 1 use

Day Ability 1: Bewilder: stop a player from using their day abilities, the player will not be informed unless trying to use their abilities, 3 use

Night Ability 1: Serve Wine: serve a player wine, occupying them for the night

Night Ability 2: Party: occupy all visitors visiting you, goes through occupation immunity

Btw this is still work in progress but I’d like to hear some feedback/suggestions

Read full topic
item.source: I Have Seen A Lot Of People Not Liking Some Offensive Classes So I'm Going To Rework Them
